text: Pakistani film directors Sabiha Sumar (second from left), Tanya Mirza (right), and Indian film director Nikkhil Advani (centre) take a selfie as they visit the Golden Temple in Amritsar on Wednesday. A 24-member delegation of Pakistani film directors and singers visited Amritsar as part of the ‘Zeal For Unity’ initiative to bridge the gap between India and Pakistan through cultural experiences.— Photo: AFP
title: A seamless picture
